name: Cube Fight (Xslash)
description:
Cube Fight is a simple 2D shooter game that you can play and chill out with your friends. Here you can find abilities that will randomly spawn across the map and velocity-based player movement giving you a dynamic gameplay experience. What are you waiting for? Download the game and check it out by yourself! :D

Have any bugs or ideas? Please send it to this Discord server!

I strongly recommend using Itch launcher! For game updates etc.
